flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Its entire body isnshielded by ansteel-hard shell.fWhat lurks insidenthe armor is antotal mystery.
It remains immova­nbly rooted to itsntree. It scattersfpieces of its hardnshell to drive itsnenemies away.
Usually foundnhanging on to anfat tree trunk. Itfshoots out bits ofnits shell when itnsees action.
FORRETRESS conceals itself inside itsnhardened steel shell. The shell is openednwhen the POKéMON is catching prey,fbut it does so at such a quick pacenthat the shell’s inside cannot be seen.
FORRETRESS conceals itself inside itsnhardened steel shell. The shell is openednwhen the POKéMON is catching prey,fbut it does so at such a quick pacenthat the shell’s inside cannot be seen.
It keeps itself inside its steel shell.nThe shell is opened when it is catchingnprey, but it is so quick that the shell’sninside cannot be seen.
It remains immovably rooted to its tree.nIt scatters pieces of its hard shell tondrive its enemies away.
Its entire body is shielded by a steel-nhard shell. What lurks inside the armor isna total mystery.
It is encased in a steel shell. Itsnpeering eyes are all that can benseen of its mysterious innards.
It is encased in a steel shell. Itsnpeering eyes are all that can benseen of its mysterious innards.
It is encased in a steel shell. Itsnpeering eyes are all that can benseen of its mysterious innards.
Its entire body is shielded by ansteel-hard shell. What lurks insidenthis shell is a total mystery.
It remains immovably rooted to itsntree. It scatters pieces of its hardnshell to drive its enemies away.
Il est prisonnier d’une coquillend’acier. Ses yeux vigilants sont lanseule partie visible de son corps.
It is encased in a steel shell. Itsnpeering eyes are all that can benseen of its mysterious innards.
Il est prisonnier d’une coquillend’acier. Ses yeux vigilants sont lanseule partie visible de son corps.
It is encased in a steel shell. Itsnpeering eyes are all that can benseen of its mysterious innards.
It is encased in a steel shell. Itsnpeering eyes are all that can benseen of its mysterious innards.
It is encased in a steel shell. Itsnpeering eyes are all that can benseen of its mysterious innards.
こうてつの　カラで　まもられている。nすきまから　めだまが　のぞいているがnなかみの　しょうたいは　なぞのまま。
강철 껍질이 몸을 보호하고 있다.n틈새에서 엿보고 있는 눈이 있지만n내용물의 정체는 수수께끼다.
Il est prisonnier d’une coquille d’acier. Ses yeuxnvigilants sont la seule partie visible de son corps.
Dieses Pokémon ist von einer Stahlhülle umgeben.nSeine stechenden Augen sind alles, was man vonnihm sieht.
Se protege con su concha de acero de tal manera quensolo se pueden ver sus ojos.
È incassato in una conchiglia d’acciaio. A parte glinocchi scrutatori, nessuno sa cosa ci sia all’interno.
It is encased in a steel shell. Its peering eyes arenall that can be seen of its mysterious innards.
鋼鉄の　殻で　守られている。nすきまから　目玉が　のぞいているがn中身の　正体は　ナゾのまま。
きに　くっついたまま　うごかない。nかたいカラの　はへんを　ばらまいてnちかづくものを　おいはらう。
나무에 붙어 있는 채로 안 움직인다.n단단한 껍질 파편을 흩뿌려서n다가오는 자를 쫓아버린다.
Il est totalement fixé à son arbre. Il lance desnmorceaux de sa carapace pour faire fuir son ennemi.
Es bleibt stets bei seinem Baum. Es verstreut Teilenseiner Schale, um so seine Feinde zu verjagen.
Permanece inmóvil agarrado a su árbol. Dispara trozosnde su dura coraza para alejar al enemigo.
Rimane saldamente attaccato al suo albero. Tienenlontani i nemici lanciando pezzi del duro guscio.
It remains immovably rooted to its tree. It scattersnpieces of its hard shell to drive its enemies away.
木に　くっついたまま　動かない。n硬い殻の　破片を　ばらまいてn近づくものを　追い払う。
こうてつの　カラの　なかに　ほんたいが　いる。nえものを　つかまえる　ときに　カラが　ひらくがnあまりの　はやさに　なかみは　みえないのだ。
강철 껍질 안에 본체가 있다.n먹이를 잡을 때 껍질이 열리지만n너무 빨라서 안이 보이진 않는다.
Foretress se cache dans sa carapace en acier trempé.nLa carapace s’ouvre quand il attrape sa proie, mais cela senpasse tellement vite qu’il est impossible de voir à l’intérieur.
Forstellka versteckt sich in seiner stahlharten Schale.nDie Schale öffnet sich, wenn es nach Beute schnappt.nDies geht jedoch so schnell, dass man das Innere dernSchale nicht zu Gesicht bekommt.
Forretress se esconde dentro de su concha de aceronreforzada. Solo la abre cuando va a atrapar a su presa, peronocurre tan rápido que no da tiempo de ver su interior.

Forretress si nasconde all’interno della sua conchigliand’acciaio temprato. La conchiglia si apre soltanto per catturarenla preda, ma il Pokémon ha una rapidità tale che non ènpossibile osservarne l’interno.
Forretress conceals itself inside its hardened steel shell.nThe shell is opened when the Pokémon is catching prey,nbut it does so at such a quick pace that the shell’s insidencannot be seen.
鋼鉄の　カラの　中に　本体が　いる。n獲物を　捕まえる　ときに　カラが　開くがnあまりの　速さに　中身は　見えないのだ。
こうてつの　カラの　なかに　ほんたいが　いる。nえものを　つかまえる　ときに　カラが　ひらくがnあまりの　はやさに　なかみは　みえないのだ。
강철 껍질 안에 본체가 있다.n먹이를 잡을 때 껍질이 열리지만n너무 빨라서 안이 보이진 않는다.
Foretress se cache dans sa carapace en acier trempé.nLa carapace s’ouvre quand il attrape sa proie, mais cela senpasse tellement vite qu’il est impossible de voir à l’intérieur.
Forstellka versteckt sich in seiner stahlharten Schale.nDie Schale öffnet sich, wenn es nach Beute schnappt.nDies geht jedoch so schnell, dass man das Innere dernSchale nicht zu Gesicht bekommt.
Forretress se esconde dentro de su concha de aceronreforzada. Solo la abre cuando va a atrapar a su presa, peronocurre tan rápido que no da tiempo de ver su interior.

Forretress si nasconde all’interno della sua conchigliand’acciaio temprato. La conchiglia si apre soltanto per catturarenla preda, ma il Pokémon ha una rapidità tale che non ènpossibile osservarne l’interno.
Forretress conceals itself inside its hardened steel shell.nThe shell is opened when the Pokémon is catching prey,nbut it does so at such a quick pace that the shell’s insidencannot be seen.
鋼鉄の　カラの　中に　本体が　いる。n獲物を　捕まえる　ときに　カラが　開くがnあまりの　速さに　中身は　見えないのだ。
なにかが　ちかづくだけで　こうてつのnカラのはへんを　うちだし　こうげき。nいしは　なく　じょうけんはんしゃだ。
무엇이든 다가오기만 하면n강철 껍질의 파편을 쏘며 공격한다.n의지가 없는 조건 반사다.
只要有東西靠近，牠就會n發射鋼鐵外殼的碎片來攻擊。n這是一種與意識無關的條件反射。
Il attaque tout ce qui s’approche d’un peu tropnprès en lançant des morceaux de sa coquillend’acier. Il n’a aucun contrôle sur ce réflexe.
Kommt ihm irgendetwas zu nahe, feuert es Teilenseiner stählernen Schale ab. Das geschiehtnjedoch aus Reflex, nicht aus eigenem Willen.
Cuando algo se le acerca, ataca disparandonfragmentos de su coraza de acero. Se trata denun puro acto reflejo.
Scaglia frammenti del suo guscio d’acciaiontemprato contro qualunque cosa gli si avvicini,nma si tratta di un riflesso involontario.
When something approaches it, it fires offnfragments of its steel shell in attack. This is notna conscious action but a conditioned reflex.
なにかが　近付くだけで　鋼鉄のnカラの破片を　撃ちだし　攻撃。n意思は　なく　条件反射だ。
只要一有东西靠近，它就会射出n钢铁外壳的碎片进行攻击。n这是一种无意识的条件反射。
えものを　のみこむ　いっしゅんだけnカラの　なかみが　あらわれるが　そのnすがたを　みたものは　まだいない。
먹이를 삼키는 순간에는n껍질 안의 모습이 나타나지만n그 모습을 본 자는 아직 없다.
只有在吞下獵物的瞬間，n殼裡的身體才會出現。n至今還沒有人見過牠的真面目。
On ne peut voir l’intérieur de sa carapace quenlorsqu’il engloutit sa nourriture, mais il est sinrapide que personne n’a encore jamais réussi.
Sein Inneres ist nur kurz sichtbar, wenn es flugsnseine Beute verschlingt. Bisher hat es noch keinnMensch geschafft, einen Blick hineinzuwerfen.
El momento en el que engulle a su presa es elnúnico instante donde muestra su cuerpo, peronhasta ahora ningún humano lo ha visto.
L’istante in cui ingoia la preda è l’unico momentonin cui è possibile sbirciare nella sua conchiglia.nNessuno sa esattamente come sia fatto.
In the moment that it gulps down its prey, theninside of its shell is exposed, but to this day,nno one has ever seen that sight.
獲物を　呑み込む　一瞬だけnカラの　中身が　現れるが　そのn姿を　見た者は　まだいない。
仅在吞下猎物的瞬间，壳里面的n身体才会出现，但至今仍未有n人或宝可梦见过其真面目。
